recipes.title: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: This vibrant stir-fry combines tender chicken, colorful vegetables, Thai basil, and spicy chili sauce for a flavorful and aromatic Thai-inspired dish. Serve over jasmine rice.

recipes.title: Creamy Garlic Parmesan Pasta
recipes.description: Enjoy a comforting bowl of creamy garlic Parmesan pasta with al dente spaghetti coated in a rich sauce made with garlic, butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese. Top with parsley and extra Parmesan.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste

recipes.title: Grilled Citrus Salmon with Mango Salsa
recipes.description: Elevate your seafood experience with grilled citrus salmon marinated in a zesty glaze. Topped with tropical mango salsa, this dish offers a burst of citrus and fruity flavors. Serve with asparagus or quinoa.

recipes.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Indulge in the simplicity of a classic Margherita pizza with fresh basil leaves, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce on a thin and crispy crust.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste

recipes.title: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
recipes.description: Enjoy tender and juicy roasted chicken infused with the flavors of lemon, garlic, and a medley of herbs. Perfectly seasoned and roasted to golden perfection.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
recipes.description: Savor the goodness of a colorful vegetable stir-fry with tofu, packed with crunchy vegetables and tossed in a savory sauce. Serve over steamed rice or noodles.
ingredients: 1 (14 oz) package firm tofu, drained and cubed

recipes.title: Mouthwatering BBQ Ribs
recipes.description: Fall-off-the-bone tender and smoky BBQ ribs that are perfectly glazed with a tangy and sweet sauce. Serve with your favorite sides for a delicious barbecue feast.

recipes.title: Gourmet Beef Burger
recipes.description: Sink your teeth into a juicy and flavorful gourmet beef burger topped with melted cheese, fresh vegetables, and a special sauce. Perfect for your next cookout or weekend treat.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad with Balsamic Glaze
recipes.description: Enjoy a refreshing Caprese salad made with ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, and fragrant basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic glaze for an extra burst of flavor.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo Lasagna
recipes.description: Indulge in layers of tender chicken, creamy Alfredo sauce, lasagna noodles, and melted cheese in this decadent and satisfying chicken Alfredo lasagna.
ingredients: 1 (10 oz) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained

recipes.title: Crispy Honey-Glazed Salmon
recipes.description: Delight in the irresistible combination of crispy-skinned salmon glazed with a sweet and sticky honey sauce. Served with a side of steamed vegetables or roasted potatoes.

recipes.title: Penne Arrabbiata
recipes.description: Tantalize your taste buds with a spicy and flavorful Penne Arrabbiata, featuring al dente pasta tossed in a fiery tomato sauce infused with garlic, chili flakes, and fresh herbs.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Indulge in a creamy and rich mushroom risotto made with Arborio rice, saut√©ed mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and a touch of white wine. A comforting and elegant dish.

recipes.title: Baked Spinach and Artichoke Dip
recipes.description: Enjoy a creamy and cheesy baked spinach and artichoke dip that's perfect for parties or game nights. Serve with tortilla chips or toasted bread for a delicious appetizer.
ingredients: 1 (14 oz) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (10 oz) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained

recipes.title: Cajun Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Savor the bold and spicy flavors of Cajun shrimp pasta, featuring succulent shrimp cooked in a creamy sauce with Cajun seasoning, bell peppers, and onions. Serve over linguine or fettuccine.
